titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CONSULTANT CODE (INITIATED SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY) - Description

div.p: CONSULTANT CODE (INITIATED SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY) is the same as data element CONSULTANT CODE.
CONSULTANT CODE (INITIATED SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY) is the CONSULTANT CODE of the CONSULTANT who initiated the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy.

p.b: CONSULTANT CODE (INITIATED SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY) will be replaced with both PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE and PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ENTRY IDENTIFIER, which are the most recently approved national information standards to describe the required definition.
